## LightModel.isTexCoordIndexUsed() method

Checks if the specified texture coordinate index is being used

**Signature:**

```typescript
isTexCoordIndexUsed(texCoordIndex: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  texCoordIndex | number | The texture coordinate index |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the texture coordinate index is being used
